function NPC_110011:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : 보석에 누적되는 데미지 2 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 누적 데미지 3 : 보석의 밝기 State값( 체력에 따라 0~4의 값을 가진다. ) --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 3 )
NPC_110011.LimitForBreakJewel = NPC_110011.MaxHP*3/4
NPC_110011.TalIdBackAttack0 = 211001103 NPC_110011.TalIdBackAttack1 = 211001123 NPC_110011.TalIdEnrage = 211001107
NPC_110011.BufIdRegen1 = 40112 NPC_110011.BufIdRegen2 = 40113 NPC_110011.BufIdRegen3 = 40114 NPC_110011.BufIdRegen4 = 40115 NPC_110011.BufIdRegen5 = 40116
NPC_110011.BufIdBerserk = 40111
NPC_110011.TalIdPain0_1 = 211001117 NPC_110011.TalIdPain0_2 = 211001118 NPC_110011.TalIdPain1_1 = 211001133 NPC_110011.TalIdPain2_2 = 211001134
end
-- 덥치기, 충격파에 사용 function NPC_110011:OnFinishAndAggroNear( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Target = ThisNPC:Aggro( "near", 0 ) end
function NPC_110011:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 3 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
-- 방향과 거리에 따라서 근접 평타나 뒷발길질 공격을 수행 function NPC_110011:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist < 200 and IsRear then -- 뒤에있을경우 뒷발길질 if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_110011.TalIdBackAttack0 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_110011.TalIdBackAttack1 ) end end end
function NPC_110011:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen1 ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_2_3(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_1(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_2(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_3(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_4(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_3_5(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_5_0(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:OnHitCapsule_5_1(HitInfo) return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_110011:ProcessPain( HitInfo, ThisNPC ) local TotDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + HitInfo.Damage local LimitValue = ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()/10
--DEBUG CODE --GLog( "Golem Pain Dmg Tot: " .. TotDamage .. "\n" ) --_LogHitInfo( HitInfo )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, TotDamage ) if TotDamage > LimitValue then local Pain1ID = 0 local Pain2ID = 0 if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then Pain1ID = NPC_110011.TalIdPain0_1 Pain2ID = NPC_110011.TalIdPain0_2 else Pain1ID = NPC_110011.TalIdPain1_1 Pain2ID = NPC_110011.TalIdPain1_2 end
if HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_KNOCKBACK ).Value >= 100 or HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_THROWUP ).Value >= 100 then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( Pain1ID ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( Pain1ID ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0) end elseif HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_BEATEN ).Value >= 100 or HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_STUN ).Value >= 100 or HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_KNOCKDOWN ).Value >= 100 then
if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( Pain2ID ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( Pain2ID ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0) end end end end
function NPC_110011:ProcessHitJewel( HitInfo ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim )
NPC_110011:ProcessPain( HitInfo, ThisNPC )
-- 가슴의 보석이 빠졌으면 체크를 중지한다. if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then return HitInfo end
if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_110011.TalIdEnrage then return HitInfo end
local DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) + HitInfo.Damage
local diff = NPC_110011.LimitForBreakJewel - DmgAcc
-- 파트파괴 체크 if diff <= 0 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) NPC_110011:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdBerserk, 0, 0 ) ThisNPC:Aggro("random", 0)
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_110011.TalIdEnrage ) else
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, DmgAcc )
-- 보석 밝기값 조절 local State = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) local NewState = 5-(diff/NPC_110011.LimitForBreakJewel)*5 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, NewState ) NewState = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 )
if State == NewState then return HitInfo end
NPC_110011:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, State ) NPC_110011:GainBuff( ThisNPC, NewState ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_110011:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, State ) --GLog( "NPC_110011:RemoveBuffByState" .. State .."\n" )
if State == 0 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen1 ) elseif State == 1 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen2 ) elseif State == 2 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen3 ) elseif State == 3 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen4 ) elseif State == 4 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen5 ) end end
function NPC_110011:GainBuff( ThisNPC, State ) --GLog( "NPC_110011:GainBuffByState" .. State .."\n" )
if State == 0 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen1 ) elseif State == 1 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen2 ) elseif State == 2 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen3 ) elseif State == 3 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen4 ) elseif State == 4 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_110011.BufIdRegen5 ) end end
function NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage/10 end
return HitInfo end
